data.name: CreateDatabase
data.value:
USE [master] GO
/****** Object: Database [CHANGENAME] Script Date: 03/09/2010 08:48:41 ******/ CREATE DATABASE [CHANGENAME] ON PRIMARY ( NAME = N'CHANGENAME', FILENAME = N'C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL10.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\DATA\CHANGENAME.mdf' , SIZE = 6144KB , MAXSIZE = UNLIMITED, FILEGROWTH = 1024KB ) LOG ON ( NAME = N'CHANGENAME_log', FILENAME = N'C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL10.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\DATA\CHANGENAME_1.ldf' , SIZE = 6272KB , MAXSIZE = 2048GB , FILEGROWTH = 10%) GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET COMPATIBILITY_LEVEL = 100 GO
IF (1 = FULLTEXTSERVICEPROPERTY('IsFullTextInstalled')) begin EXEC [CHANGENAME].[dbo].[sp_fulltext_database] @action = 'enable' end GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET ANSI_NULL_DEFAULT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET ANSI_NULLS OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET ANSI_PADDING OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET ANSI_WARNINGS OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET ARITHABORT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET AUTO_CLOSE OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET AUTO_CREATE_STATISTICS ON GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET AUTO_SHRINK OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS ON GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET CURSOR_CLOSE_ON_COMMIT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET CURSOR_DEFAULT GLOBAL GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET RECURSIVE_TRIGGERS OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET DISABLE_BROKER GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS_ASYNC OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET DATE_CORRELATION_OPTIMIZATION OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET TRUSTWORTHY OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET ALLOW_SNAPSHOT_ISOLATION OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET PARAMETERIZATION SIMPLE GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET READ_COMMITTED_SNAPSHOT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET HONOR_BROKER_PRIORITY OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET READ_WRITE GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET RECOVERY SIMPLE GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET MULTI_USER GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET PAGE_VERIFY CHECKSUM GO
ALTER DATABASE [CHANGENAME] SET DB_CHAINING OFF GO USE [CHANGENAME] GO
CREATE SCHEMA [Version] AUTHORIZATION [dbo] GO
USE [CHANGENAME] GO
SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
SET ANSI_PADDING ON GO
CREATE TABLE [Version].[Version]( [SequenceId] [int] NOT NULL, [DateOfRelease] [date] NOT NULL, [Description] [varchar](4000) NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]
GO
SET ANSI_PADDING OFF GO
EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'Contains version history for this database. Maintained by the SequentialSqlUpdater tool.' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'Version', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'Version' GO
